title: Teaching Maya
description: Librarian's note: This is an alternate cover edition for ASIN: B00FNWO8VM.***The perfect blend of bondage, dominance, submission and tender romance***Unable to experience arousal or reach orgasm with her first boyfriend, twenty-one year old Maya feels like a freak. In desperation, she hatches a plan to seduce the best-selling author Ryan Clayborn during a two-week vacation, and have him coach her in bed.Ryan sleeps with many women, but commits to none.
